tasks: Wash dishes or load the dishwasher

Organize and declutter closets

Clean sink and countertop, removing toothpaste stains and watermarks

Run the dishwasher or wash dishes, ensuring the sink is clear of dirty items
Make beds and fluff pillows, arranging them neatly

Declutter surfaces and desks, placing items in their designated spots

Refresh water bowls and litter boxes, replacing with clean water and litter

Take dogs for a walk or playtime
Check and replenish pet food and supplies
Sweep front porch and walkway, removing dirt and debris
Clear clutter from outdoor seating, arranging cushions and pillows
Water and tend to plants, checking for any wilted leaves or dry soil
Shake out outdoor rugs, removing dirt and dust
Plan meals for the week
Create a grocery list
Grocery shopping
Prepare and portion ingredients
Cook and store meals in containers
Scrub and disinfect the bathtub and shower
Clean grout and tiles
Polish faucets and fixtures
Remove soap scum and hard water stains

Vacuum or sweep all floors
Dust furniture and surfaces
Clean windows and mirrors
Wipe down kitchen appliances
